snippet: An August checklist for rising high school seniors, simplifying mortgage loan documents, criticism grows as more check-cashing stores expand in poorer areas and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times Sunday and Monday editions.

headline.main: Monday Reading: August Checklist for Rising High School Seniors
